title: Mr. Lex Borrero – Latin Entertainment Legend – CEO – Podcaster
description:
ABOUT YOU VS. YOU
In the podcast "You vs You," host Lex Borrero dives into the personal battles and triumphs of entertainment's most accomplished figures. Through candid discussions, the show aims to unveil the human side of these celebrated individuals, stripping away their heroic facades. By sharing their stories of vulnerability and resilience, "You vs You" seeks to motivate listeners to confront their own challenges, unlock their potential, and pursue their dream lives with newfound freedom and inspiration.
Episodes available here:
Https://www.iheart.com/podcast/1119-you-vs-you-w-lex-borrero-278703875/
ABOUT LEX BORRERO
Lex Borrero is a Colombian-born entrepreneur, producer, and the CEO and co-founder of the trailblazing entertainment company NEON16. Renowned for his innovation and leadership across music, film, and culture, Borrero has played a pivotal role in shaping the global Latin entertainment landscape. His work with top-tier artists-including J Balvin, Bad Bunny, Justin Bieber, and Maroon 5-has contributed to over 500 million records sold and numerous Billboard Hot 100 hits.
Borrero's impact has been widely recognized: he's a multiple-time Billboard Latin Power Player and a Billboard 40 Under 40 honoree. Under his direction, NEON16 has rapidly evolved into a multi-dimensional powerhouse spanning music, film, television, live events, and gaming. The company has been named one of Fast Company's Most Innovative Music Companies in both 2021 and 2025.

A key force behind the NVISION Latino Film & Music Festival, Borrero is helping usher in its next chapter with a bold 2025 relaunch in Miami.
In addition to his work at NEON16, Borrero co-manages Will Smith, spearheading the artist's celebrated return to music-including his first Billboard No. 1 in over 25 years, a full-length album, and a global tour.
Beyond the entertainment world, Borrero is a passionate watch and Porsche collector, with a keen eye for design and architecture. Through his Instagram account @0260lifestyle_, he shares rare timepieces, personal stories, and candid conversations with fellow collectors and industry icons.
